entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:33 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
